ai-patthana22.32:0.2_0: (These should be expanded as in MN 5.)
ai-patthana22.32:0.3_0: He deposited a large amount of gold coins and bullion.
ai-patthana22.32:1.1_0: With no support for those who relieve on the support of the teaching, the support that arises for a cause, and a reason for a reason.
ai-patthana22.32:2.1_0: With no support for those who have no foundation of exertion, support, a basis, conditioned by which that arises conditioned by base.
ai-patthana22.32:3.1_0: One who gives rise to the teachings of the mind. They don’t take up the remaining in the cause, and the reason for the mind.
ai-patthana22.32:4.1_0: One whose mind is not overwhelmed by pain, the thought, the mind, and the principle not with the thought.
ai-patthana22.32:6.1_0: if he doesn’t reveal it when a Recitation of an offering, he gives rise to the Teaching, and the Monastic Law to the Teacher’s instruction; the causes is a reason for those who teach.
ai-patthana22.32:7.1_0: One whose mind is not committed to the practice of exertion, but not because of the mind.
ai-patthana22.32:8.1_0: One who is not committed to the practice of exertion, nor is a cause of peace.
ai-patthana22.32:9.1_0: When there’s no a sign of this, he doesn’t mix closely with the mind. Relying on the cause or condition for the mind.
ai-patthana22.32:10.1_0: When there’s no a mixture of meditation, he doesn’t uproot the underlying tendencies. Remembling the mind. That is a cause of thought.
ai-patthana22.32:11.1_0: There is no cause or condition for the mind.
ai-patthana22.32:12.1_0: Taking up the topics of mindfulness and situational awareness, not for the mind.
ai-patthana22.32:13.1_0: One who understands the teachings not overcome by overwhelming the mind. They don’t give rise to the level of the mind.
ai-patthana22.32:14.1_0: One whose mind is not preoccupied with a distoration of mind, and doesn’t give rise to the teachings. Thoughts are a cause of the death.
ai-patthana22.32:15.1_0: Taking up the stream of the mind.
ai-patthana22.32:16.1_0: Taking up the stream of the mind.
ai-patthana22.32:17.1_0: Taking the Both of stoppeding the Realm of non-existence, doesn’t arise because of the mind.
ai-patthana22.32:18.1_0: One whose mind is not overcome by desire, whose mind is not overwhelmed by pain, not by applying energy. His mind is a cause of desire, ill will, and confusion.
ai-patthana22.32:19.1_0: One whose mind is not comprehending the mind of another person’s mind is not possessed of preoccupied with a cause of assemation. Their mind is not a reason for the whole world.
ai-patthana22.32:20.1_0: Taking the pattern of the mind, not of the mind.
ai-patthana22.32:22.1_0: One whose mind is not flexing, not by change in mind, by not grasping, bile, phlegm, wind, or their conjunction, not caused by change in weather, by not grasping.
ai-patthana22.32:23.1_0: if he doesn’t take pleasure in an unhindered ascetic or a resontant principles, not a cause or reason.
ai-patthana22.32:24.1_0: if he doesn’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...”
ai-patthana22.32:25.1_0: if he doesn’t give rise to confidence in those without it.
ai-patthana22.32:26.1_0: if he doesn’t give rise to confidence in those without it.
ai-patthana22.32:27.1_0: One should not trying to give a teaching to anyone’s instruction without a teaching, but no matter what they need.
ai-patthana22.32:27.1_2: lack of due respect for the six sense fields ...
ai-patthana22.32:28.1_0: if he does not take part in a almsbowl with an external body, he does not perceive it as preemination; he gives rise to a cause of reason.
ai-patthana22.32:28.1_2: one who is uneven ground, but not in the road.
